name: Lifebuoy Health Herbal Shampoo
description: Lifebuoy herbal shampoo is a mild shampoo which is ideal for daily use. It contains milk protein and herbal extracts that keep your hair healthy and shiny. Do use this shampoo after oiling your hair to get rid of that greasy, oily feeling as this shampoo is going to leave you with hair that is soft and beautiful. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
